effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom’s form.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom’s appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

flavor_text_entries.text: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electronic signal to open a door.
